author: USA TODAY, Elizabeth Weise, USA TODAY
title: 8 strains of the coronavirus are circling the globe. Here's what clues they're giving scientists.
description: Scientists sequenced the genomes of eight coronavirus strains circling the globe providing hints about the effectiveness of efforts to halt the virus.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO At least eight strains of the coronavirus are making their way around the globe, creating a trail of death and disease that scientists are tracking by their genetic footprints.
While much is unknown, hidden in the virus's unique microscopic fra… [+8885 chars]
